transcript: Well, of course not because you've got your backpack with you the whole time. Now if you this you said this was a travel bag why weren't you carrying it on if it was so important?

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Well, of course not because you've got your backpack with you the whole time.  Now, if you--you said this was a travel bag.  Why weren't you carrying it on if it was so important?
